needs: Bilqis seeks to apply mechanical engineering expertise in CAD, FEA, thermodynamics, and DFM/DFA to deliver measurable outcomes efficiently. They aim to clarify project outcomes and constraints early, manage budgets responsibly, reduce costs and waste, and maintain alignment with stakeholders through lightweight documentation and clear accountability, all within part-time capacity.
personality: Bilqis exhibits an analytical and systems-oriented collaboration style prioritizing evidence, inclusion, and continuous learning. They prefer early identification of unknowns through incremental probes, emphasize simplicity and humane processes, value experiments over debates, and maintain transparent communication via decision logs, runbooks, and concise updates to keep teams aligned and iterate effectively.
